= Introduction =

The goal of this project is to extend the [http://http://tuscany.apache.org/ Apache Tuscany] with the support for dynamically updating components in a running system in a safe and low-disruptive way.  


= Background Information =

Please refer to the following papers for the problem and solutions of dynamic component update:
  * Version-Consistency
  * Tranquility
  * Quiescence
